src:
Legenda Balap Amerika Hadir di Hot Rod Weekend Party 2019
06 Nov 2019, 12:17 by Pribadi Wicaksono (Kontributor), Wawan Priyanto
TEMPO.CO, Yogyakarta - Komunitas pecinta mobil klasik kustom Amerika yang berbasis di Yogyakarta, Hotrodiningrat, bersiap menggelar lagi event tahunannya Hot Rod Weekend Party (HWP) pada 9-10 November 2019 mendatang.
Pada ajang HWP tahun ini akan mengambil lokasi di Parkir Barat Hotel Melia Purosani Kota Yogyakarta dengan mengambil tema Las Vegas. Yang terinspirasi dari mobil-mobil berderet parkir di halaman hotel berbintang lima di Las Vegas.
Tak kurang 70 mobil kustom Amerika bakal hadir dalam gelaran yang sudah digelar kelima kalinya ini.
Namun yang menarik, pada event ini penyelenggara sedikit membocorkan bakal kedatangan salah satu legenda dunia balap Amerika, yakni Ford 1932 atau kerap disebut Ford 32 yang kini sudah amat langka dan diburu para kolektor keberadaannya.
“Event kali ini rencananya ada pemilik Ford 32 dan satu seri Cadillac yang masih orisinil ikut gabung, mungkin dari Jakarta dan Surabaya,” ujar pegiat komunitas Hotrodiningrat Ari Prabowo alias Popo kepada Tempo Selasa 5 November 2019.
Popo menuturkan, langkanya seri Ford 32 di dunia juga Indonesia seringkali membuat para pemiliknya menyembunyikan mobil itu ketika mengkoleksinya.
Sehingga seri itu selama ini jarang sekali terlihat di public, kecuali replica atau custom yang meniru bentuknya.
“Untuk yang seri orisinilnya Ford 32 itu yang langka,” ujarnya.
Seri Ford 32 diakui Popo masih menjadi legenda bagi pecinta mobil Amerika dan juga kolektor mobil klasik.
Bisa dibilang, lahirnya aliran hotrod Amerika, perintisnya karena Ford 32 ini. Ketika para pilot veteran perang dunia yang biasa mengendarai pesawat butuh mobil kencang dan mulai banyak mengorek Ford 32 untuk hobi balapan di era itu.
“Hubungan hotrod dengan Ford 32 sangat erat. Dulu rodster-rodster (pencetus aliran hodrot) bermunculan saat masa kejayaan Ford 32,” ujarnya.
Ford 32 orisinil sendiri populasinya di Indonesia diprediksi tak lebih dari 50 unit. “Tapi kolektor itu biasanya tak mau dilihat, entah alas an pajak atau lainnya,” ujarnya.
Taksiran harga Ford 32 itu jika lengkap dengan surat bisa kisaran haragnya menurut Popo sekitar Rp 1 hingga 3 miliar.
Komunitas Hotrodiningrat sendiri sempat memaerkan replika Ford 1932 buatannya yang dikustom dengan gaya Rat Rod alias mesin terlihat vulgar saat event Hotrod Weekend Party 2018 lalu.
Meskipun hanya replica, namun Ford 32 besutan Hotrodiningrat itu mengusung mesin orisinil kreasi Ford, yakni flathead V8 3800 cc serta kaki-kaki direndahkan hampir menyentuh tanah.
"Mobil Rat rod Ford 32 ini paling lama dibangun, memakan waktu sampai 5 tahun karena susah mendapatkan mesin aslinya," ujar tokoh Hotrodiningrat, Arif van Jamil.
Mesin flathead V8 untuk nyawa replika Ford 32 ini sangat susah didapatkan alias harus impor.
Sedangkan untuk bodi seluruhnya dibangun atau dibuat sendiri agar menyerupai desain Ford 1932 umumnya.
Untuk biaya membeli mesin dan membangun Ford 1932 kustom hot rod ini Arif menaksir pada kisaran Rp 500 jutaan. "Paling mahal beli mesin orisinilnya, di Amerika pabriknya Ford ada susah, apalagi di Indonesia," ujarnya.
text:
American Racing Legend Comes to 2019 Hot Rod Weekend Party
06 Nov 2019, 12:17 by Pribadi Wicaksono (Contributor), Wawan Priyanto
TEMPO.CO, Yogyakarta - Yogyakarta's custom-made classic American car community, Hotrodiningrat, is preparing to hold another annual event Hot Rod Weekend Party (HWP) on 9-10 November 2019.
This year's HWP will take place in the West Parking of the Melia Purosani Hotel in Yogyakarta by taking the theme of Las Vegas. Which is inspired by the cars lined up in the parking lot of a five-star hotel in Las Vegas.
No less than 70 American custom cars will be present at the event that has been held for the fifth time.
But what's interesting is, at this event the organizers leaked a little bit about the arrival of one of the legends of the American racing world, namely Ford 1932 or often called Ford 32 which is now very rare and hunted by collectors for its existence.
"This event is planned to have a Ford 32 owner and one Cadillac series who are still original in joining, maybe from Jakarta and Surabaya," Hotrodiningrat community activist Ari Prabowo alias Popo told Tempo on Tuesday, November 5, 2019.
Popo said, the scarcity of Ford 32 series in the world as well as Indonesia often made the owners hide the car when collecting it.
So that the series has rarely been seen in public, except replica or custom that mimics its shape.
"For the original Ford 32 series, it's a rarity," he said.
The Ford 32 series is recognized Popo is still a legend for lovers of American cars and also classic car collectors.
In a way, the birth of American hotrod flow, the pioneer because of this Ford 32. When veteran pilots of the world war who used to drive planes needed fast cars and started picking up Ford 32 for racing hobbies in that era.
"Hotrod's relationship with Ford 32 is very close. In the past, roders (originators of hodrotic flow) emerged during the heyday of Ford 32, "he said.
The original Ford 32 alone population in Indonesia is predicted to be no more than 50 units. "But the collector usually does not want to be seen, whether for tax or other reasons," he said.
Estimated price of Ford 32, if complete with the letter, the price of Harag according to Popo is around Rp. 1 to 3 billion.
The Hotrodiningrat community itself had a chance to sell a replica of their Ford 1932 custom made in the style of the Rat Rod aka the engine that looked vulgar during the 2018 Hotrod Weekend Party event.
Even though it is only a replica, the Ford 32 made by Hotrodiningrat carries the original Ford engine, the 388 cc V8 flathead and lowered legs that almost touch the ground.
"The Ford 32 Rat Rod car has been built for the longest, taking up to 5 years because it is difficult to get the original engine," said Hotrodiningrat, Arif van Jamil.
The V8 flathead engine for Ford 32 replica lives is very difficult to obtain, aka having to import.
As for the whole body built or made to resemble the design of the Ford 1932 in general.
For the cost of buying an engine and building a Ford 1932 custom hot rod, Arif estimates it at around Rp. 500 million. "The most expensive thing is to buy the original engine, in America the Ford plant is difficult, especially in Indonesia," he said.
